title: 1k Wins - Play with Riot?
body:
Hello! Before I say anything, I want to say that if this isn't possible, it isn't that much of a big deal. I recently hit 999 wins and have seen many people play with someone from Riot for their thousandth win. Do they still do this? I am aware they are extremely busy. Again, it's no biggie if it can't happen. Just wanting to see if they still do this and if any "Rioter" would like to play with me for mine. 

Thanks! :-)

replies.body: I don't think they do that anymore, which is sad, because it was a really cool idea.
Hmm, that stinks. Was really looking forward to this!
If only I knew this before hand because I JUST recently got 1000 wins.... I cri .-.{{item:3070}}

Hiya! 

(A bit late on this.) Would you still be down to play a game? :D

Riot didn't even play with me for my 2000th win. Gonna ask when it hits 3000 though. It's funny because I've played with @RiotPendragon quite a few times. He was a questionable Master Yi when I played with him. I hope he's improved. XD
